0x00400058 / ori $t0,$0, 3 / 0x34080003 / 0x00000000 / 0x00000000 / 0x00000000

1.
0x00400058 / ori $t2,$0, 8 / 0x340a0008 / 0x00000003 / 0x00000008 / 0x00000008

0x00400060 / add $t1,$t0,$t0 / 0x01084820 / 0x00000003 / 0x00000008 / 0x00000000

0x00400064 / add $t1,$t1,$t2 / 0x012a4820 / 0x00000003 / 0x00000006 / 0x00000008
 
0x00400068 / jr $ra / 0x03e00008 / 0x00000003 / 0x0000000e / 0x00000008 


2

a) x = 2 $t1= -4 / x = 3 $t1= -2 / x = 4 $t1= 0 / x = 5 $t1= 2

b) 
0x00400060/ add $t1,$t0,$t0 / 0x01084820 / 0x00000003 / 0x00000000 / 0x00000008

0x00400064 / sub $t1,$t1,$t2 / 0x012a4822 / 0x00000003 / 0x00000006 / 0x00000008

0x00400068 / jr $ra / 0x03e00008 / 0x00000003 / 0xfffffffe / 0x00000008

3

b)	 x= 3 // t0 = 3 / t1= -2 / t2= 8
	 x= 5 // t0 = 5 / t1= 2 / t2= 8

c)
